fields.name: reload <?command name>
fields.value: Transpile and reload the specified <?command name> or all commands if none specified

fields.name: die
fields.value: Log out and kill Bean-Stalk's process

fields.name: commands
fields.value: List all available commands; Use <command name> -help for more info on a specific command

fields.name: vrms
fields.value: List all non-free packages installed on Bean-Stalk's OS
